text: RT @DailyCaller ‘You Don’t Determine Who We Vote For’: Football Legend Herschel Walker Blasts Joe Biden Following ‘Ain’t Black’ Comment https://dailycaller.com/2020/05/22/football-legend-herschel-walker-joe-biden-black-comment-trump-supporters/

RT @KayColesJames My DNA, life experience, heritage and culture are what define my Blackness. 

With all due respect, @JoeBiden, you don’t get to define who I am.

I didn’t know I needed this. https://twitter.com/rexchapman/status/1253016359455383552 QT @RexChapman Quarantined stuntmen, bruh... http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWJbcg-WoAYgsPL.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1252663128074182656/pu/vid/320x568/JOOK9coml0-M0rAQ.mp4?tag=10

RT @SenatorTimScott Joe Biden’s comments are the most arrogant and condescending thing I’ve heard in a very long time. I am offended, but not surprised. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYoh4LNXYAot325.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1263859062690717696/vid/480x270/Ce1LWZ5RYI9TJype.mp4?tag=13

Jet flyovers and corporate TV ads ain't gonna cut it. If we truly want to honor our frontline workers, we must guarantee to them:

🛌Universal paid sick leave
👷🏻‍Safe workplaces
🥽Protective gear
💪$15 minimum wage
✊🏾Right to a union
🍼Child care
⚠️Hazard pay
🏥Health care

RT @SenMarkey A simultaneous peak of coronavirus and the seasonal flu later this year would be catastrophic if we're not prepared. @SenWarren and I are urging the White House to act now to ensure our system won’t be overwhelmed if we have to face this grim scenario.
https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/21/health/senators-coronavirus-flu-fall/index.html

We’re never going to be able to slow and stop the spread of the virus if we continue to deny entire communities access to testing, treatment, or care.

Health care is a right and it shouldn’t depend on immigration status. 
https://www.vox.com/2020/5/20/21263978/booker-immigrant-health-care-insurance-coronavirus

That was fun—thanks for having me on #LovettOrLeaveIt, @JonLovett! Always happy to help answer questions on the importance of strong oversight in our government. https://twitter.com/crookedmedia/status/1264179400226021376 QT @crookedmedia New #LovettorLeaveIt: Sen. @ewarren is here to talk about oversight and the pandemic response. Then, she sticks around as we quiz listeners. @kalpenn judges the monologue, @jmillstein joins to deliver a zoom commencement, and the rant wheel is back. https://crooked.com/podcast/big-structural-podcast/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYtEdnKXQAAKZYJ.jpg

For decades, giant multinational corporations got away with crushing the competition in the agriculture sector—now a handful of companies control most of the food we eat. We need to fix this broken system—that’s what my Farm System Reform Act aims to do. https://www.foodandwaterwatch.org/news/mega-mergers-are-guilty-pandemic-our-broken-food-supply-chain

Sen Rubio joined @SenCoryGardner, @SenatorBennet & 127 bipartisan members of Congress in urging @POTUS, @EsperDoD, & @FEMA_Pete to ensure National Guard personnel on the front lines of #COVID19 response efforts receive the federal benefits they have earned
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=FFD818F0-F036-43C1-9105-9E5E27097F0A

Sen Rubio welcomed @SecretarySonny's announcement providing details of @USDA's Coronavirus Food Assistance Program, which will provide up to $16 billion in relief to America’s farmers and ranchers impacted by the #coronavirus pandemic.

How to apply 🔽
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=6620BEF2-1D4A-422C-B6EA-4CD0CA989962

People have fought and died for our right to vote, and that right must be protected when Americans vote during a pandemic. My VoteSafe Act would authorize $5 billion to:

-Expand vote-by-mail
-Require 20 days of early voting
-Ensure in-person voting is still safe and accessible

Congratulations to the HBCU Class of 2020 on all of your accomplishments! I can’t wait to see the mark you make on the world. #UndefeatedHBCUDay

RT @DougJones While these two fight over their big mistakes let’s make sure Alabama doesn’t make one with either Sessions or a former football coach.  I could sure use your help folks!

I did my duty & you're damn fortunate I did. It protected the rule of law & resulted in your exoneration. Your personal feelings don't dictate who Alabama picks as their senator, the people of Alabama do. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1263970567838932993

It’s an unspeakable tragedy what happened to Breonna Taylor. @LucyMcBath and I are calling on the Department of Justice to immediately launch an independent investigation into her killing. 

Her family deserves answers and accountability.

One way we can support public servants on the frontlines of this crisis is by strengthening the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program. We owe it to our nurses, teachers, & first responders to get them the student loan forgiveness Congress promised them. https://www.forbes.com/sites/wesleywhistle/2020/05/20/senate-democrats-propose-revamp-to-public-service-loan-forgiveness/#30d0045360bc

Republicans are working hard to maintain an economy based on starvation wages. They oppose raising the minimum wage and making it easier for workers to join unions. Now, they want to end extended unemployment benefits. Stand up and fight back for human dignity.

I've been deeply concerned for weeks about @Amazon's inability to protect their employees. Their failure to implement basic safety measures early on has endangered workers and put entire communities at risk. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/19/technology/amazon-coronavirus-workers.html?action=click&module=Spotlight&pgtype=Homepage

The fight to protect free and fair elections is critical, and we’ll need elected officials at all levels of government to make voting safe and easy across the country. 

Find out how to take action in your state and join us in the fight. https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1264264275083890689 QT @TeamWarren Every American should have the option to vote by mail or safely vote in person—no exceptions. 

Take action today and demand that your elected officials make voting safe and easy. 
https://elizabethwarren.com/Democracy?source=soc-WB-team-tw-democracry-rollout

I've got some bad news for my Republican colleagues: No, we are not going to let you cut Social Security. At a time when half of older Americans have no retirement savings, our job must be to expand Social Security, not cut it.
https://www.commondreams.org/news/2020/05/22/gop-plot-gut-social-security-behind-closed-doors-gains-steam-senate-covid-19-talks

Making sure every American has access to easy and safe voting is one of the most important things we can do right now.

I’m proud to partner with @IndivisibleTeam for a virtual town hall on how to protect our right to vote safely during this pandemic.
https://act.elizabethwarren.com/page/s/rsvp-dsv-townhall?source=soc-EVENT-ew-tw
Learn more about tests and locations here via @Gothamist: https://gothamist.com/news/your-guide-antibody-test-locations-costs-and-accuracy-nyc

Did you know?

There are 2 types of COVID tests!

The nasal swab👃tests if you have COVID now.

Antibody blood tests🩸check if you already had COVID, even w/ few or no symptoms.

I got my antibody test today at First Baptist in Queens w/ our amazing nurses. You can get one too! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1264306223886807040/pu/img/tbi69Pa482uexEC_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1264306223886807040/pu/vid/480x270/Q4-AsPLA6H7h_Giy.mp4?tag=10

It's clear that China has no intention of respecting Hong Kong's autonomy and fundamental right to exist as a democracy. The United States cannot stay silent while this egregious attack on democracy continues.

We must stand firm with the people of Hong Kong. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1263472394628476938 QT @nytimes Breaking News: China is pushing for sweeping new laws that would tighten its grip over Hong Kong, a move that could reignite protests in the city https://trib.al/E9yzrJp

#EidMubarak to each and every family celebrating Eid al-Fitr across America and around the world. May this day bring blessings to you and your loved ones in the year ahead. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYvKcDyX0AMLok_.jpg

USPS delivers medicine to our nation’s seniors. It helps small businesses in rural America and ensures that people are able to safely cast their ballots. Yet Trump and his administration are actively threatening the USPS’ funding in the middle of a pandemic. We will fight this.
Bruce and I wish a joyous Eid al-Fitr to all Muslims celebrating in the United States and around the world. #EidMubarak!
RT @nytimes The front page of The New York Times for May 24, 2020 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYu9OuCWoAE6v5P.jpg
As the Muslim community marks the end of the holy month of Ramadan, I'm wishing those celebrating here in New Jersey and around the world a blessed and happy Eid al-Fitr! #EidMubarak
As always, our firefighters are our heroes. Many thanks to our San Francisco Fire Department for their courage and effectiveness in fighting the fire at Pier 45. Our prayers are with them. @SFFDPIO

There are two systems of justice in America: friends of Trump get released to home confinement during the pandemic while other low-risk, vulnerable people remain in overcrowded prisons. It’s not right. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYvul-2WoAANx2Z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1264365885353013248/vid/320x320/acqYUB0Yy8yCivti.mp4?tag=13

RT @RobBontaCA Thank you @SenKamalaHarris for raising your voice with me to reject Anti-AAPI intolerance, intimidation, and hate. This is reprehensible and inexcusable!
@AsianJournalCom
#APIHeritageMonth
#AAPIHM https://twitter.com/AsianJournalCom/status/1263877734566113282 QT @AsianJournalCom .@SenKamalaHarris & @RobBontaCA on surge of anti-Asian hate: "Any witness to these acts has the responsibility to speak up, report, & condemn them...the Commander in Chief must show real leadership that unifies our country instead of sowing hate" https://www.asianjournal.com/features/opinion-editorial-columnists/sen-harris-and-assemblymember-bonta-aapi-community-leadership-crisis/
Eid Mubarak to all our Muslim friends. Wishing joy and prosperity to all who are celebrating.

Trump and members of Congress have put the AAPI community at risk by racializing COVID-19 as the “Chinese virus” and “Wuhan virus.” It’s on all of us to speak up, report, and condemn any racist attacks.

Read my op-ed with @RobBontaCA. #APAHM https://www.asianjournal.com/features/opinion-editorial-columnists/sen-harris-and-assemblymember-bonta-aapi-community-leadership-crisis/
